amendment.description: Page 47, line 10, after "Stonegarden" insert ", $50,000,000 shall be for Interoperable Emergency Operations Grants,".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to appropriate $50,000,000 for the purposes of Interoperable Emergency Operations Grants.

action.text: Mr. Carter raised a point of order against the Richardson amendment (A020). Mr. Carter stated that the amendment seeks to provide funds for programs not yet authorized. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Richardson.
